alert.note: Alert for South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 4:15PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Linn County through 445 PM PDT... At 415 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Brownsville, or 9 miles south of Albany, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Tangent and Shedd. In Oregon this includes Interstate 5 between mile markers 218 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
